title: Friends With God Story Bible: Why God Loves People Like Me
features: Help kids build a true friendship with God! With the
Friends With God Story Bible
, children meet Bible-times friends who share their thrilling stories, each from their own view.

They march side-by-side with David as he rushes toward Goliath. Turn with Peter to see Jesus alive after his resurrection. Stand next to Abraham under a glittering, star-filled sky, imagining impossible promises come true.
With each stunningly illustrated story Bible page, children will discover...
54 first-person storiesspanning both Old and New Testaments—so kids see how God has always loved and worked through everyday people just like them!
54 first-person stories
spanning both Old and New Testaments—so kids see how God has always loved and worked through everyday people just like them!
Reflections from each Bible character—helping kids notice how God's love touches their own lives.
Reflections from each Bible character
—helping kids notice how God's love touches their own lives.
Beautiful illustrationsfrom artist David Harrington—making this children's Bible a visual treat.
Beautiful illustrations
from artist David Harrington—making this children's Bible a visual treat.
Watch as kids' faith growsas they draw close to the God who loves them and calls them his friend, too.
Watch as kids' faith grows
as they draw close to the God who loves them and calls them
his friend
, too.
Kids deepen their friendship with God even more by pairing this story Bible with the
Friends With God Devotions for Kids
Kids meet God's Bible-time friends with 54 devotions that help them glimpse who God is, see how he cares for those he loves, and grow in their own friendship with God.
description: grew up in Texas and Colorado, and graduated from Biola University in Los Angeles, California. Jeff is the co-creator of the Buddy Quest and Gabbit mobile apps for kids and families, and writes content for books, apps, games, and videos. He's written more than a dozen books for young readers, including the Friends With God Story Bible, the Best of Buddies storybook series, and The Runaway Candy Cane. He lives in northern Colorado with his wife (a high school English teacher) and three children.

love for art began at an early age when he drew on everything, eventually leading to a career in illustration at the Art Center College of Design in Pasadena, where he earned a BFA with honors. David has illustrated numerous children's books and enjoys snowboarding, surfing, and spending time with his wife and children in Laguna Hills, California.
